## Installation

You can install the development version of FlowSoFine from GitHub with:

``` r
library(devtools)
install_github("JonasKup/FlowSoFineApp")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example, eval = F}
library(FlowSoFineApp)

launchAp()
```
